title: [The] taylor's lamentation. Shewing how he pick'd up a crafty miss, who left him sleeping in bed, and taking his cloaths, watch and money, so that he was forc'd to send for his wife, which added much to his grief. To the tune of the Old mans wish. Licensed according to order.
publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare and J. Back.,
